head.title: Metro Briefing | New York: Shirley: Woman Dies In House Fire

hedline.hl1: Metro Briefing | New York: Shirley: Woman Dies In House Fire
hedline.hl2: Shirley, N.Y.: Woman Dies in House Fire

abstract.p: Delores Hutt dies in Shirley, NY, house fire (S)

block.p: A woman died yesterday morning in a house fire, the Suffolk County police said. The woman, Delores Hutt, 57, was trapped in an upstairs bathroom during the fire at a house on Saint George Drive West, in Shirley, Long Island, the police said. According to the police, Ms. Hutt's sister, Dorothy Landau, was making tea about 4:30 a.m. when she saw flames coming from a blanket on the couch. An investigation continued yesterday, but the police said the fire did not appear to be suspicious.
